settings.editor: A Nap sugaraiból nyerjük az energiát
settings._custom_css: selector .yjye8ncb{border-bottom-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);border-left-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);border-right-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);border-top-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);color: rgb(250, 250, 250);display: block;height: 32px;list-style-type: none;margin-right: 20px;margin-top: -5px;max-width: 32px;min-width: 26px;overflow-wrap: break-word;width: 26px;vertical-align: top;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: 0px;}selector .yjye8ncb::before{line-height: normal;overflow-clip-margin: content-box;overflow-x: clip;overflow-y: clip;-webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);-webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);}selector .yjye8ncb::after{line-height: normal;overflow-clip-margin: content-box;overflow-x: clip;overflow-y: clip;-webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);-webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);}@media (max-width: 1024px) {selector .yjye8ncb{font-size: 13.463768005371094px;margin-right: 20px;margin-top: -5px;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: 0px;}}@media (max-width: 767px) {selector .yjye8ncb{font-size: 15.850746154785156px;margin-right: 20px;margin-top: -5px;margin-bottom: 0px;margin-left: 0px;}}selector .elementor-widget-container{list-style-type: none;overflow-wrap: break-word;flex-direction: column;}selector .elementor-widget-container::before{display: block;line-height: normal;-webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);-webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);}selector .elementor-widget-container::after{display: block;line-height: normal;-webkit-text-fill-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);-webkit-text-stroke-color: rgb(250, 250, 250);}@media (max-width: 1024px) {selector .elementor-widget-container{flex-direction: column;}}@media (max-width: 767px) {selector .elementor-widget-container{flex-direction: column;}}

selector .elementor-button-text{cursor: pointer;font-family: "DM Sans", sans-serif;overflow-wrap: break-word;text-align: center;user-select: none;vertical-align: middle;padding-inline-start: 30px;padding-inline-end: 30px;flex-direction: column;}selector .elementor-button-text::before{display: block;line-height: 27px;white-space: nowrap;}selector .elementor-button-text::after{display: block;line-height: 27px;white-space: nowrap;}@media (max-width: 1024px) {selector .elementor-button-text{padding-inline-start: 20px;padding-inline-end: 20px;flex-direction: column;}}@media (max-width: 1024px) {selector .elementor-button-text::before{line-height: 21px;}}@media (max-width: 1024px) {selector .elementor-button-text::after{line-height: 21px;}}@media (max-width: 767px) {selector .elementor-button-text{flex-direction: column;}}selector, selector .elementor-widget-container {display: inline}
